// å›¾ç»“æ„çš„ BFS éå†ï¼Œä»èŠ‚ç‚¹ s å¼€å§‹è¿›è¡Œ BFSï¼Œä¸”è®°å½•éå†æ­¥æ•°ï¼ˆä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è¾¹çš„æ¡æ•°ï¼‰
// æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è‡ªè¡Œç»´æŠ¤ State ç±»ï¼Œè®°å½•ä» s èµ°æ¥çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
class State {
    // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
    int node;
    // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
    int step;

    public State(int node, int step) {
        this.node = node;
        this.step = step;
    }
}


void bfs(Graph graph, int s) {
    boolean[] visited = new boolean[graph.size()];
    Queue<State> q = new LinkedList<>();

    q.offer(new State(s, 0));
    visited[s] = true;

    while (!q.isEmpty()) {
        State state = q.poll();
        int cur = state.node;
        int step = state.step;
        System.out.println("visit " + cur + " with step " + step);
        for (Edge e : graph.neighbors(cur)) {
            if (visited[e.to]) { 
                continue;
            }
            q.offer(new State(e.to, step + 1));
            visited[e.to] = true;
        }
    }
}

class State {
public:
    // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
    int node;
    // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
    int step;

    State(int node, int step) : node(node), step(step) {}
};

void bfs(const Graph& graph, int s) {
    vector<bool> visited(graph.size(), false);
    queue<State> q;

    q.push(State(s, 0));
    visited[s] = true;

    while (!q.empty()) {
        State state = q.front();
        q.pop();
        int cur = state.node;
        int step = state.step;
        cout << "visit " << cur << " with step " << step << endl;
        for (const Edge& e : graph.neighbors(cur)) {
            if (visited[e.to]) {
                continue;
            }
            q.push(State(e.to, step + 1));
            visited[e.to] = true;
        }
    }
}

class State:
    def __init__(self, node, step):
        # å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
        self.node = node
        # ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
        self.step = step


def bfs(graph, s):
    visited = [False] * len(graph)
    from collections import deque

    q = deque([State(s, 0)])
    visited[s] = True

    while q:
        state = q.popleft()
        cur = state.node
        step = state.step
        print(f"visit {cur} with step {step}")
        for e in graph.neighbors(cur):
            if visited[e.to]:  
                continue
            q.append(State(e.to, step + 1))
            visited[e.to] = True

type State struct {
    // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
    node   int
    // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
    step int
}

func bfs(graph Graph, s int) {
    visited := make([]bool, graph.size())
    q := []*State{{s, 0}}
    visited[s] = true
    for len(q) > 0 {
        state := q[0]
        q = q[1:]
        cur := state.node
        step := state.step
        fmt.Printf("visit %d with step %d\n", cur, step)
        for _, e := range graph.neighbors(cur) {
            if visited[e.to] { 
                continue
            }
            q = append(q, &State{e.to, step + 1})
            visited[e.to] = true
        }
    }
}

// æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è‡ªè¡Œç»´æŠ¤ State ç±»ï¼Œè®°å½•ä» s èµ°æ¥çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
class State {
    // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
    int node;
    // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
    int step;

    public State(int node, int step) {
        this.node = node;
        this.step = step;
    }
}


void bfs(Graph graph, int s) {
    boolean[] visited = new boolean[graph.size()];
    Queue<State> q = new LinkedList<>();

    q.offer(new State(s, 0));
    visited[s] = true;

    while (!q.isEmpty()) {
        State state = q.poll();
        int cur = state.node;
        int step = state.step;
        System.out.println("visit " + cur + " with step " + step);
        for (Edge e : graph.neighbors(cur)) {
            if (visited[e.to]) { 
                continue;
            }
            q.offer(new State(e.to, step + 1));
            visited[e.to] = true;
        }
    }
}

// æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è‡ªè¡Œç»´æŠ¤ State ç±»ï¼Œè®°å½•ä» s èµ°æ¥çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
class State {
public:
    // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
    int node;
    // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
    int step;

    State(int node, int step) : node(node), step(step) {}
};

void bfs(const Graph& graph, int s) {
    vector<bool> visited(graph.size(), false);
    queue<State> q;

    q.push(State(s, 0));
    visited[s] = true;

    while (!q.empty()) {
        State state = q.front();
        q.pop();
        int cur = state.node;
        int step = state.step;
        cout << "visit " << cur << " with step " << step << endl;
        for (const Edge& e : graph.neighbors(cur)) {
            if (visited[e.to]) {
                continue;
            }
            q.push(State(e.to, step + 1));
            visited[e.to] = true;
        }
    }
}

# æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è‡ªè¡Œç»´æŠ¤ State ç±»ï¼Œè®°å½•ä» s èµ°æ¥çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
class State:
    def __init__(self, node, step):
        # å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
        self.node = node
        # ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
        self.step = step


def bfs(graph, s):
    visited = [False] * len(graph)
    from collections import deque

    q = deque([State(s, 0)])
    visited[s] = True

    while q:
        state = q.popleft()
        cur = state.node
        step = state.step
        print(f"visit {cur} with step {step}")
        for e in graph.neighbors(cur):
            if visited[e.to]:  
                continue
            q.append(State(e.to, step + 1))
            visited[e.to] = True

type State struct {
    // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
    node   int
    // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
    step int
}

func bfs(graph Graph, s int) {
    visited := make([]bool, graph.size())
    q := []*State{{s, 0}}
    visited[s] = true
    for len(q) > 0 {
        state := q[0]
        q = q[1:]
        cur := state.node
        step := state.step
        fmt.Printf("visit %d with step %d\n", cur, step)
        for _, e := range graph.neighbors(cur) {
            if visited[e.to] { 
                continue
            }
            q = append(q, &State{e.to, step + 1})
            visited[e.to] = true
        }
    }
}

class State {
    constructor(node, step) {
        // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
        this.node = node;
        // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
        this.step = step;
    }
}

var bfs = function(graph, s) {
    var visited = new Array(graph.size()).fill(false);
    var q = [new State(s, 0)];
    visited[s] = true;
    while (q.length !== 0) {
        var state = q.shift();
        var cur = state.node;
        var step = state.step;
        console.log("visit " + cur + " with step " + step);
        var neighbors = graph.neighbors(cur);
        for (var i = 0; i < neighbors.length; i++) {
            var e = neighbors[i];
            if (visited[e.to]) { 
                continue;
            }
            q.push(new State(e.to, step + 1));
            visited[e.to] = true;
        }
    }
}

# æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è‡ªè¡Œç»´æŠ¤ State ç±»ï¼Œè®°å½•ä» s èµ°æ¥çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
class State:
    def __init__(self, node, step):
        # å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
        self.node = node
        # ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
        self.step = step


def bfs(graph, s):
    visited = [False] * len(graph)
    from collections import deque

    q = deque([State(s, 0)])
    visited[s] = True

    while q:
        state = q.popleft()
        cur = state.node
        step = state.step
        print(f"visit {cur} with step {step}")
        for e in graph.neighbors(cur):
            if visited[e.to]:  
                continue
            q.append(State(e.to, step + 1))
            visited[e.to] = True
    go
    // å›¾ç»“æ„çš„ BFS éå†ï¼Œä»èŠ‚ç‚¹ s å¼€å§‹è¿›è¡Œ BFSï¼Œä¸”è®°å½•éå†æ­¥æ•°ï¼ˆä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è¾¹çš„æ¡æ•°ï¼‰
// æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è‡ªè¡Œç»´æŠ¤ State ç±»ï¼Œè®°å½•ä» s èµ°æ¥çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
type State struct {
    // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
    node   int
    // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
    step int
}

func bfs(graph Graph, s int) {
    visited := make([]bool, graph.size())
    q := []*State{{s, 0}}
    visited[s] = true
    for len(q) > 0 {
        state := q[0]
        q = q[1:]
        cur := state.node
        step := state.step
        fmt.Printf("visit %d with step %d\n", cur, step)
        for _, e := range graph.neighbors(cur) {
            if visited[e.to] { 
                continue
            }
            q = append(q, &State{e.to, step + 1})
            visited[e.to] = true
        }
    }
}

class State {
    constructor(node, step) {
        // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ ID
        this.node = node;
        // ä»èµ·ç‚¹ s åˆ°å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„éå†æ­¥æ•°
        this.step = step;
    }

var bfs = function(graph, s) {
    var visited = new Array(graph.size()).fill(false);
    var q = [new State(s, 0)];
    visited[s] = true;
    while (q.length !== 0) {
        var state = q.shift();
        var cur = state.node;
        var step = state.step;
        console.log("visit " + cur + " with step " + step);
        var neighbors = graph.neighbors(cur);
        for (var i = 0; i < neighbors.length; i++) {
            var e = neighbors[i];
            if (visited[e.to]) { 
                continue;
            }
            q.push(new State(e.to, step + 1));
            visited[e.to] = true;
        }
    }
}

void bfs(Graph graph, int s) {
    boolean[] visited = new boolean[graph.size()];
    Queue<State> q = new LinkedList<>();

    q.offer(new State(s, 0));
    visited[s] = true;

    while (!q.isEmpty()) {
        State state = q.poll();
        int cur = state.node;
        int step = state.step;
        System.out.println("visit " + cur + " with step " + step);
        for (Edge e : graph.neighbors(cur)) {
            if (visited[e.to]) { 
                continue;
            }
            q.offer(new State(e.to, step + 1));
            visited[e.to] = true;
        }
    }
}

var bfs = function(graph, s) {
    var visited = new Array(graph.size()).fill(false);
    var q = [new State(s, 0)];
    visited[s] = true;
    while (q.length !== 0) {
        var state = q.shift();
        var cur = state.node;
        var step = state.step;
        console.log("visit " + cur + " with step " + step);

        for (var i = 0; i < neighbors.length; i++) {
            var e = neighbors[i];
            if (visited[e.to]) { 
                continue;
            }
            q.push(new State(e.to, step + 1));
            visited[e.to] = true;
        }
    }
}
